TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SuggestionSpanFlags extends System.Enum

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Text.Style.SuggestionSpanFlags AutoCorrection = int32(4)

summary.para: Sets this flag if the auto correction is about to be applied to a word/text that the user is typing/composing. This type of suggestion is rendered differently to indicate the auto correction is happening.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Text.Style.SuggestionSpanFlags EasyCorrect = int32(1)

summary.para: Sets this flag if the suggestions should be easily accessible with few interactions. This flag should be set for every suggestions that the user is likely to use.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Text.Style.SuggestionSpanFlags Misspelled = int32(2)

summary.para: Sets this flag if the suggestions apply to a misspelled word/text. This type of suggestion is rendered differently to highlight the error.
